forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will change to some rain showers through the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
